popup.title: Your privacy
popup.description: We use cookies to ensure the site works properly, analyze traffic and personalize content. Please consent to their use.
popup.footer: By clicking outside the banner or scrolling the page, you accept all cookies

settings.description: Manage your cookie preferences. For more information, see our

necessary.title: Essential cookies and localStorage
necessary.description: Required for the website and applications to function properly. These include: consent preferences (cookie-consent), language (pollar-language), color theme (pollar-theme), anonymous visitor ID for counting page views (pollar_uid), AI assistant session ID (pollar-visitor-id), stock watchlist (stock-watchlist), selected countries filter (pollar_countries), and the Connections game state (pollar.powiazania). We also use Sentry for error monitoring — it collects data about application crashes to help us fix them.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Google Analytics (_ga, _ga_*) — helps us understand how users interact with the website. Firebase Analytics — tracks in-app events and user properties (for logged-in users). Contentsquare — a user behavior analysis tool including heatmaps and session recording. We also use Umami Analytics — a tool that does not use cookies and collects only anonymized statistical data.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: X (Twitter) Ads — cookies used for conversion tracking and measuring the effectiveness of advertising campaigns (guest_id, guest_id_marketing, guest_id_ads, personalization_id, muc_ads).

settings.notice: Changes to cookie settings are saved automatically and take effect immediately. To completely remove all cookies, clear your browser data.
